Actions.Text: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS
REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

Title: Relates to local hiring for certain projects
Summary: Relates to local hiring for certain projects including those that live within a ten mile radius of the location of such project.
LawCode: Add ยง1834-a, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to local hiring for certain projects
